method.name: DELETE
method.doc: To delete an authentication policy, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the policies resource URI.

request.doc:
Delete the authentication policy with Id 101.
DELETE https://{appliance_hostname}/iam/access/v8/authentication/policies/101
A predefined authentication policy cannot be deleted.
To determine the policy_id value of the policy to be deleted, issue an HTTP GET command on the policies resource URI: https://{appliance_hostname}/iam/access/v8/authentication/policies/.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

response.doc: No content returned. The request was successful.
Bad Request. There is a problem with the request. The JSON result describes the problem.
Not Found. The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
Conflict. The JSON result indicates the problem.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
